lines.text: Scotch! You don't drink Scotch. I'm betrayed! Woman, what man's been here?
Oh, well, uh... I, uh... anyone I know?
Of course it's none of my business; that doesn't satisfy my curiosity. If we were married, I wouldn't have any curiosity.

[laughing]
Darling, I wouldn't marry you if you were the last man on earth!
If I were the last man on earth, you wouldn't have to. As a public institution, I'd have too many responsibilities.
You always get your way with women, don't you?
If I said no, I'd be a liar; if I said yes, I'd be a fool.
Whatever exists between you two must be fine, or you wouldn't be in it.
